data.meta_description: Nigeria can enhance its energy security, create employment opportunities, promote economic growth, and reduce its dependence on imported energy resources by‚Ä¶
data.text:
A hearty congratulations to our #HumansofOando Meet Engr. Basil Oyakhire, a shining star in the industry! His remarkable achievement - winning the prestigious Regional Reservoir Description and Dynamics Award by SPE International is a testament to his dedication to excellence. With the Africa Region Award added to his Nigeria Award win last year, Engr. Basil's impact on reservoir engineering knows no bounds! His commitment to advancing the field inspires us all to strive for greatness, setting new benchmarks for the global energy community. #HumansofOando #SPEAward

A round of applause for our #HumanofOando! Engr. Adeyemi Adebajo has been honoured with The Mr. Emeka C. Ene New Energy, Carbon Capture & Sequestration Award by the SPE International Nigerian Council for his exceptional leadership in transforming Nigeria's energy landscape. This award acknowledges his remarkable work in renewable energy and carbon capture, highlighting his vision and innovation. Engr. Adeyemi's relentless drive to push the boundaries of what's possible is not only setting new standards for Oando Clean Energy (OCEL), but for the energy industry as a whole. #HumansofOando #SPEAward #NAICE

A hearty congratulations to our #HumanofOando! We are excited to celebrate Engr. Egbunefu Chigozie, EHS Manager, Oando Energy Resources, who has been honoured with The Engr. Kofi Sagoe Health, Safety, Security, Environment, and Social Responsibility Award. This prestigious accolade shows his unwavering dedication to protecting our environment, ensuring high safety and health standards in the oil & gas sector, and his commitment to social responsibility. His outstanding achievements in these areas not only set a benchmark in our industry but also make us incredibly proud. #HumansofOando #SPEAward #NAICE

From clicks to real-world impact, our youth are the digital trailblazers of sustainable development. This International Youth Day, we celebrate the innovators and changemakers who are shaping a brighter tomorrow. üåç‚ú® Watch this video to hear from two of our Oando Graduate Accelerated Program (OGAP) Trainees, Michael Eyitayo and Tomiwa Afere as they narrate their journey at Oando thus far. #YouthDay2024 #SustainableProgress

Knowledge gained, network expanded, and possibilities ignited. Day 2 of SPE NAICE 2024 was filled with displays of expertise and innovative ideas. We're proud to be part of a community that's driving the energy industry forward with purpose and ingenuity. #Day2Recap #NAICE2024 #SPE #HumansofOando

The first day of SPE NAICE 2024 was quite engaging. Our team made the most of every opportunity to connect, contribute, and learn; from the opening keynote to the final networking session. Thought leaders and industry experts provided valuable insights with passion on the state of the energy industry. #Day1Recap #NAICE2024 #SPE #HumansofOando #OilAndGas

Earlier today, Akinbambo Ibidapo-Obe, GM, Commercial at Oando Energy Resources, shared a compelling vision for Nigeria‚Äôs energy future. This pivotal moment presents an opportunity for Nigeria to assert its position as a major player in the energy sector, driving growth, innovation, and prosperity for generations to come. Stay tuned for more excerpts from SPE NAICE 2024 tomorrow. #HumansofOando #NAICE2024 #SPE #Oando #OilAndGas

Don‚Äôt miss out on the opportunity to hear from Solomon Agba, Asset Manager, Oando Energy Resources at SPE NAICE 2024. He will be discussing at a panel session titled, ‚ÄúUnlocking Upstream Value: Developing Markets, Trade Access, and Facilitating Partnerships in the Midstream and Downstream‚Äù alongside other industry leaders. Be sure to mark your calendars for Tuesday, August 6, 2024, and learn how to enhance upstream operations, expand market opportunities, improve trade access, and create effective partnerships in the midstream and downstream sectors. #NAICE2024 #Oando #OilAndGas

Save the date for NAICE 2024! Join us on Monday, August 5th, 1:30-4:30 p.m., as Akinbambo Ibidapo-Obe, GM, Commercial, Oando Energy Resources, discusses ‚ÄúThe Outlook of the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry, Post IOC Divestments and Exits: Challenges and Opportunities.‚Äù #NAICE2024 #Oando #OilAndGas
